thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 23 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Dropbox Reports 2017 Pro Forma Net Loss Per Share Of $0.21

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dropbox Reports 2017 Pro Forma Net Loss Per Share Of $0.21
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Dropbox Inc:
* DROPBOX REPORTS 2017 REVENUE OF $1.11 BILLION VERSUS $844.8 MILLION
* DROPBOX REPORTS 2017 PRO FORMA NET LOSS PER SHARE OF $0.21
* DROPBOX REPORTS 11 MILLION PAYING USERS AS OF DEC 31, 2017 VERSUS 8.8 MILLION AS OF DEC 31, 2016
* DROPBOX SAYS CEO ANDREW HOUSTONâ€˜S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $110.2 MILLION, INCLUDING $109.6 MILLION OF STOCK AWARDS
* DROPBOX SAYS CO-FOUNDER ARASH FERDOWSI'S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $47.3 MILLION, INCLUDING $46.7 MILLION OF STOCK AWARDS Source text: ( bit.ly/2HISTH8 )
